alert.note: Alert for San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 25 at 3:15PM PST until December 26 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. Inundation of up to two feet feet above ground level is possible along shorelines and low-lying coastal areas, which corresponds to minor flood level. * WHERE...San Juan County, Western Whatcom County and Western Skagit County zones. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 8 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding due to tidal overflow is expected around high tide. This may lead to flooding of parking lots, parks, and roads, with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Inundation above ground level refers to the height above the Mean Higher High Water (MHHW) level.

area.areaDesc: San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County
